title: GREAT LOCATION**LUXURY LIVING**ROOMMATES ARE WELCOME**
posting_body: ['GREAT LOCATION**LUXURY LIVING**ROOMMATES ARE WELCOME**', 'Listing ID #: 212885', 'Address: 10 HANOVER SQUARE, #2Q', 'Price: $3,500', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 2.0', 'Bathrooms: 1.0', 'Pets: Pets OK', 'Building Amenities', 'Doorman', 'Elevator', 'Health Club', 'Laundry', 'Lounge', 'Subway', 'Valet', 'Apartment Amenities', 'Dishwasher', 'Granite Kitchen', 'High Ceilings', 'Marble Bath', 'Open View', 'Renovated', 'Walk In Closet', 'Great layout for this convertible two bedrooms apartment feature spacious closets, and the upscale finishes you deserve.', 'Upgraded kitchen boast hardwood floor, European-style cabinets, granite counter tops, and stainless steel appliances while our deluxe bath offer soaking tubs with separate showers and granite tile.', 'BUILDING AMENITIES Bike Room Community Recreation Facilities Concierge Gym Laundry in Building Live-in Super Media Room Package Room Storage Available', 'CONTACT MARCO TO SCHEDULE A PRIVATE VIEWING MOBILE 917-353-3448 EMAIL', '<URL> TEXT FOR FASTER RESPONSE', 'Marco Bianchi', 'Phone: 9173533448', 'Mobile: 9173533448', 'Email: <URL>', 'The Bouklis Group \xa0 9173533448 \xa0 9173533448 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Marco Bianchi at 9173533448']
